Package de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConfigurationPropagator
    Interface for a configuration propagator.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    Represents a configuration and provides operations for the configuration process.
    ConfigurationMatrix
    Reads all configuration file from a certain folder and saves their content in form of a selection matrix.
    ConfigurationPropagator
    Updates a configuration.
    DefaultFormat
    Simple configuration format.
    EquationFormat
    Simple configuration format.
    ExpressionFormat
    Simple configuration format.
    FeatureIDEFormat
    Extended configuration format for FeatureIDE projects.
    FeatureOrderReader Deprecated
    Use FeatureOrderFormat instead.
    SelectableFeature
    A representation of a selectable feature for the configuration process.
    TreeElement
    Basic implementation of a tree element for the configuration editor.
    XMLConfFormat
    Extended configuration format for FeatureIDE projects in XML structure.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Selection
    Defines Selection types Selected, Unselected, Undefined.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AutomaticalSelectionNotPossibleException
    This exception identifies an error in the propagation of feature selections.
    FeatureNotFoundException
    Exception indicating that a feature with a given name was not found.
    SelectionNotPossibleException
    Identifies that the user has selected or deselected a feature which is not possible according the underlying feature model with current manual selections.
